name: Abstractions
content: Abstractions is a new conference that brings together everyone involved in modern software development — designers, developers, DevOps, and community leaders — to teach, learn, and connect with each other. We've gathered a huge lineup of diverse speakers, from language creators to community builders to design innovators, and are seeking interesting and unique proposals from our peers in the industry. Register now to join us for three days in August to expand your understanding of the world of modern software development, both inside and outside the confines of your chosen expertise.
